newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.

text.p: Eight stocks fell, four rose and five were flat in 12.4-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Friday with the WIG 20 index closing at 1,591.9 points, 1.2 percent lower than at the regular session.
The remaining six stocks did not trade.
NFI units were flat in a 16.5-million-zloty turnover.
For more details Reuter-terminal users can double-click on WSECONT.
